statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); user=$(whoami); host=$(hostname -s); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf '%s@%s %s (%s) [%s]' "$user" "$host" "$dir" "$branch" "$model"; else printf '%s@%s %s [%s]' "$user" "$host" "$dir" "$model"; fi
